title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Gather input from stakeholders and subject matter experts.

title: Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, and key considerations for maintainability, scalability, performance, and security.

title: Data Modeling and Database Design
description: Design the database schema and data models for storing and managing reservoir data.

title: AI Model Development
description: Develop and train AI models for reservoir modeling and analysis.

title: User Interface Design
description: Design the user interface for visualizing and interacting with reservoir models and analysis results. The UI should be intuitive, responsive, and provide a seamless experience for users to explore and manipulate 3D reservoir models, visualize data overlays, and access analysis results. It should also support collaboration features for multiple users to work on the same model simultaneously.
